Title: Detective Conan: The Phantom of Baker Street
Writer: Gosho Aoyama (manga), Hisashi Nozawa (screenplay), Eric Vale (script writer), Eric Vale (head writer)
Actors: Rikako Aikawa, Melinda Wood Allen, Laura Bailey, Z. Charles Bolton
Plot: Conan and his friends were invited to the premier of an new virtual computer game. But someone programmed the game, that if they can't answer the riddle in the game, they all have to die.
